summary: In Passing is a collaboration between seven different filmmakers from around the world in response to Jesse Richards' 2008 Remodernist Film Manifesto.
cast: George Val Beer|Liam Maves|Heidi Elise Beaver|Luke Coverdale|Paul Dowling|Mary Beidler Gearen|Julia Gelezova|Barbara Heinz|Juan Hendriks|Leon Kavanagh|Melissa King|Jameson Lynch|Scott Maves|Ron Noest|Atoosa Pour Hosseini|Peter Rinaldi
keywords: anthology film|portmanteau film|omnibus film|collective filmmaking|multiple directors
director: Directors: Heidi Elise Beaver, Cressa Maeve Beer (as Christopher Michael Beer) | 5 more credits Â»
title: In Passing
